summary:
A Beta version of what will be a full set of Mjolnir Mark 7 Armour inspired by the Armoured Suit in the Halo games.

REDOWNLOAD FOR 3.1
descriptionHtml:
A Beta version of what will be a full set of Mjolnir Mark 7 Armour inspired by the Armoured Suit in the Halo games.

There isn\'t much to put here but there will be many bugs, so please don\'t complain about it. I only released this because enough of you requested to atleast try ti while  figure out how to make it work right. So do enjoy.

Oh and to all those \'Lore Purists\'. I understand that you like to keep thing Lore-Friendly. This, obviously, does not fit into that. However, if you don\'t like it. Then Bugger Off. You don\'t have the right to judge what people want to put in there game. You don\'t have to like it, sure. But if there are people who like this, then so be it. Don\'t fill my comments section with hate towards it.

P.S.

Forgot to say this.

To get it in-game, you have to open the console and type \'help mjolnir 0\'

Then type player.additem [insert armour code here] 1
author: Regrozenah

files.name: SpartanArmourBETA_v3_1
files.changelogHtml: Modified texture name to prevent collision and overwrite of the Mark VII Helmet\'s texture
